issues.description: The problem statement explicitly asks students to implement getters for each attribute (and test names indicate these getters should be accessible), but in the solution two getters are declared private: getLectureName() and getNumberOfInscribedStudents(). Making these getters private contradicts the exercise requirement and will prevent students/tests from accessing these values (causing confusion and failing tests).
issues.suggested_fix: Change the visibility of the two getters in the solution to public so they match the problem requirements and expected tests. Specifically, update getLectureName() and getNumberOfInscribedStudents() from private to public. This preserves the intended design (private fields with public accessors) and aligns solution, template guidance, and tests.
